name: AttachLandingPageToLanguageGroup
description:
Attach a landing page to a multi-language group.

Use this tool to associate a landing page with an existing multi-language group, enabling better management of language variations within HubSpot CMS.

parameters.name: designated_language_to_add
parameters.description: The language of the landing page to add to a multi-language group. Expect a language code.

value_schema.description: Designated language of the object to add to a multi-language group.

parameters.name: object_id_for_language_group
parameters.description: ID of the landing page to add to the multi-language group.

value_schema.description: ID of the object to add to a multi-language group.

parameters.name: primary_language_object_id
parameters.description: Provide the ID of the primary language object in the multi-language group to which the landing page will be attached.

value_schema.description: ID of primary language object in multi-language group.

parameters.name: primary_language
parameters.description: Specifies the primary language of the multi-language group to which the landing page will be attached.

value_schema.description: Primary language of the multi-language group.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the hubspot_cms API.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Designated language of the object to add to a multi-language group.

value_schema.description: Designated language of the object to add to a multi-language group.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the object to add to a multi-language group.

value_schema.description: ID of the object to add to a multi-language group.

parameters.name: primaryId
parameters.description: ID of primary language object in multi-language group.

value_schema.description: ID of primary language object in multi-language group.

parameters.name: primaryLanguage
parameters.description: Primary language of the multi-language group.

value_schema.description: Primary language of the multi-language group.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
